message: Let's split it evenly to get it over with!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
No way, I want a bigger share!
You can't have it all, Bob!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't expect me to go any further!
You're not getting the better deal, Bob!
I'm not going to give up yet! You're going to have to do better than that!
You're not getting 70% of the pie, Bob!

I'm not going to settle for this! You're going to have to give me more!
No way, Bob! You're not getting 90% of the pie!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of! I'll take the last bit of money and leave you with nothing!
You're not taking advantage of me, Bob! I'd rather have nothing than let you get away with that!
